title: 关于MythicMobs插件的伪装问题
author: qKillerp
txt_content:
MythicMobs的怪物插件，怎么在怪物有伪装属性时显示默认的名字

 Disguise的Player选项不填，又不显示伪装，填了又会替换掉名字
# 
# This example file shows you how to change default values for 
# vanilla mobs. Most MythicMobs options will work here, including
# skills and effects! **Despawn: FALSE does not work, though.**
gtz:
  Type: SPIDER
  Display: '[LV.<mob.level>]&7&l狗腿子&r'
  Health: 20
  Damage: 5
  Armor: 0
  Options:
    AlwaysShowName: false
    Despawn: true
    FollowRange: 8
    KnockbackResistance: 0.01
    MaxCombatDistance:  10
    MovementSpeed: 0.3
    PreventItemPickup: true
    PreventMobKillDrops: false
    PreventRenaming: true
    Silent: true
    PreventOtherDrops: true
  Modules:
    ThreatTable: true
  AIGoalSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 meleeattack
  - 2 lookatplayers
  - 3 randomstroll
  AITargetSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 players
  KillMessages:
  - '[死亡提示]?<trigger.name>居然被一个<mob.name>击败了？'
  - '[死亡提示]?<trigger.name>与<mob.name>较量时，被占了上风！'
  LevelModifiers:
    Health: 5
    Damage: 0.5
  Disguise:
    Type: player
    Skin: '0rangeYellow'
    Player: '%mob.level%'复制代码file:///C:/Users/Administrator/AppData/Roaming/Tencent/Users/630580569/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/HQ5J]_GR]77HH6@D6MR0WH7.png
